entry.title: Altos - Volumetric Clouds, Skybox, and Weather for Unity URP

link.href: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Altos - Volumetric Clouds, Skybox, and Weather for Unity URP/ignore-index-en/

entry.id: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Altos - Volumetric Clouds, Skybox, and Weather for Unity URP/ignore-index-en/

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Altos - Volumetric Clouds, Skybox, and Weather for Unity URP/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
Follow us for updates, tutorials, and promotions:

DISCORD // YOUTUBE // TWITTER // INSTAGRAM


Looking for a huge discount? Get all OccaSoftware assets and tools when you buy the OccaSoftware Bundle.


OccaSoftware presents: Altos - Volumetric Clouds, Skybox, and Weather for Unity URP




Dynamic Skybox. Volumetric clouds. Day night cycle. Atmosphere and Atmospheric Fog. ✨


  • Easy to use
  • Looks beautiful
  • Great for programmers and designers: no art required.
  • Widely compatible

✅Updated to Unity 6!

All the Occa Software assets are currently going through the process of being updated to Unity 6. If you run into any problems, please reach out to us!



✅Make your game look great

Our realistic skybox helps your environment attract and immerse players. This kit has everything you need to make your world an immersive environment.


The dramatic clouds move and animate. They respond to the time of day with dynamic lighting. Transition from cloudy atmospheres to desert skies in seconds. Our beautiful cloud renderer looks amazing.


✅Atmospheric Fog and Real-Time Lighting

Our interactive clouds blend into the atmospheric fog. They incorporate direct lighting from the sun and cast shadows. And they use our real-time ambient lighting to match your environment.


✅Fly Through the Clouds

You control whether you render the clouds in the background or as part of your environment. Whether you are flying, climbing, or looking up from the ground, these clouds look great. Imagine the view, the expanse, when you climb to the mountaintop and look down on the clouds.


✅Day Night Cycle

The entire sky changes over time. Our day night cycle transitions from daytime to nighttime. All part of our daytime simulation that you control. The procedural skybox works.


Sun and Moon

Celestial bodies, like the sun and moon, animate across the sky. All part of a realistic astronomical simulation. At nighttime, watch as the stars come out. And the starry sky illuminates your world.


✅Immersive Environments

Are you building a stylized, realistic, pixel art, or low poly game? Our dynamic sky will make your immersive environments stand out.


Are you making a fantasy, horror, medieval, RPG, JRPG, or sci fi project? Build new gameplay elements with our interactive clouds and time of day system.


✅Animated Cloud System

Forget about a boring static skybox generator or flat skybox textures. With a skybox pack, your game will never feel immersive. Your players will never feel like they are in nature. Instead, use Altos to create a believable atmos, and players will love your game.


✅Weather Simulation

Help your game come to life with our integrated weather simulation. Clouds zip across the sky. Our lightweight weather simulation sells your dynamic sky. Or, you can take weather control with a configurable Weathermap. Want your volumetric clouds in the shape of a flying star? If you can dream it, you can make it.


✅Great for low poly, stylized, and realistic projects

This sky is perfect for all environments. Are you are making a Japanese medieval RPG? A stylized lowpoly game set in the stars? A pixel art world set at night in the jungle? This is the skybox renderer for you. It looks great.


✅Dynamic Skybox

Our skybox package is a procedural sky with dynamic lighting. Sit back and watch animated clouds, skies, suns, moons, and stars move overhead.


Achieve the ultimate skybox customization. Make the most beautiful scenic skies.


✅Compatible and Performant

Our optimized, game ready procedural sky system has got your back. Designed with excessive quality and care. Your players will think you're using HDRP or Unreal Engine.


We know that performance is important. That's why we designed our sky to be fast.


✅Compatible with Water and Vegetation

Altos is compatible with water and vegetation, too. Whether your game is set in the ocean or in the forest, this skybox toolkit is for you.


✅Compatible with VFX

Our skybox package is also compatible with VFX. If your fantasy wizard casts a magical spell, it'll look right.


✅Optimized

You are in control. This asset is optimized. It is super quick. And you can make it even faster.


Forget about using a skybox editor. Everything you need is right here. Quality, optimized, game ready.






Game developers who have already bought Altos LOVE it ✨


"Altos is the most definitive and beautiful sky, cloud and day/night cycle system around! It worked beautifully on my project and is so easy to setup to get gorgeous looking clouds that rival industry standouts such as Microsoft Flight Simulator." - eggymelon


"Beautiful clouds and skyboxes that are incredibly easy to implement, with a day/night cycle thrown in to boot like a cherry on top. Everyone needs this!" - Fortypoundbaby


"The clouds and sky look and work great, and the developer offers amazing and fast support on Discord!" - Furgl







Compatibility

Editor Versions

✅ 2021.3 LTS

✅ 2022.3 LTS


Render Pipelines

✅ Universal

❌ Built In

❌ HDRP


Render Paths

✅ Deferred

✅ Forward


APIs

✅ DirectX

✅ OpenGL

✅ Vulkan

✅ Metal


Platforms

✅ Console

✅ PC

❌ WebGL

❌ Mobile

❌ VR



We recommend pairing Altos with...

- Buto - Volumetric Fog and Volumetric Lighting for URP

- Auto Exposure for URP

- Ultimate Lit Shader for URP

entry.title: Altos - Volumetric Clouds, Skybox, and Weather for Unity URP
entry.content:
关注我们以获取更新、教程和促销信息：

DISCORD // YOUTUBE // TWITTER // INSTAGRAM

寻找巨大的折扣吗？购买 OccaSoftware 套件 时可获得所有 OccaSoftware 资产和工具。

OccaSoftware 呈现：Altos - Unity URP 的体积云、天空盒和天气

动态天空盒。体积云。昼夜循环。气氛和大气雾。✨

  • 易于使用
  • 外观美丽
  • 适合程序员和设计师：无需艺术技能。
  • 广泛兼容

✅更新至 Unity 6！

所有 Occa Software 资产目前正在更新至 Unity 6 的过程中。如果您遇到任何问题，请与我们联系！

✅让您的游戏看起来很棒

我们的真实天空盒帮助您的环境吸引并沉浸玩家。这个工具包拥有您所需的一切，可以让您的世界成为一个沉浸式环境。

戏剧性的云彩移动并动画。它们根据一天中的时间响应动态光照。在几秒钟内从多云的气氛过渡到沙漠天空。我们美丽的云渲染器看起来令人惊叹。


✅大气雾霭与实时光照

我们的互动云朵融入了大气雾霭中。它们结合了来自太阳的直射光并投射阴影。同时，它们使用我们的实时环境光照来匹配您的环境。

✅穿越云层

您可以控制云朵是作为背景渲染还是作为环境的一部分。无论您是在飞行、攀爬，还是从地面仰望，这些云朵看起来都很棒。想象一下，当您攀登到山顶俯瞰云层时的景象和广阔。

✅昼夜循环

整个天空随着时间的推移而变化。我们的昼夜循环从白天过渡到夜晚。所有这些都是您可以控制的白天模拟的一部分。程序生成的天空盒运作良好。

太阳与月亮

天体，如太阳和月亮，在天空中动态移动。这是一个真实的天文模拟的一部分。在夜晚，观看星星的出现。星空照亮了您的世界。

✅沉浸式环境

您是在制作风格化、真实、像素艺术或低多边形游戏吗？我们的动态天空将使您的沉浸式环境脱颖而出。

您是在制作奇幻、恐怖、中世纪、角色扮演游戏、日式角色扮演游戏或科幻项目吗？利用我们的互动云朵和时间系统构建新的游戏玩法元素。

✅动态云系统

忘掉无聊的静态天空盒生成器或平面的天空盒纹理吧。使用天空盒包，您的游戏将永远不会感觉沉浸。您的玩家将永远不会觉得自己置身于大自然中。相反，使用Altos来创建一个可信的氛围，玩家将会爱上您的游戏。


✅天气模拟

通过我们的集成天气模拟，让您的游戏栩栩如生。云彩在天空中快速移动。我们的轻量级天气模拟展示了您动态的天空。或者，您可以通过可配置的天气图来控制天气。想要让您的体积云呈现飞翔的星星形状吗？只要您能想象，就能实现。

✅适用于低多边形、风格化和真实项目

这个天空盒非常适合所有环境。您是在制作一款日本中世纪角色扮演游戏吗？一款设定在星空中的风格化低多边形游戏？还是一款在丛林夜晚的像素艺术世界？这是您需要的天空盒渲染器。它看起来很棒。

✅动态天空盒

我们的天空盒包是一个具有动态光照的程序生成天空。坐下来，观看动画云彩、天空、太阳、月亮和星星在头顶移动。

实现终极天空盒自定义。创造最美丽的风景天空。

✅兼容且高效

我们优化过的、游戏就绪的程序生成天空系统为您保驾护航。设计时注重质量和细节。您的玩家会认为您在使用HDRP或虚幻引擎。

我们知道性能很重要。这就是为什么我们设计的天空要快速。

✅与水和植被兼容

Altos也与水和植被兼容。无论您的游戏设定在海洋还是森林，这个天空盒工具包都适合您。

✅与视觉特效兼容

我们的天空盒包也与视觉特效兼容。如果您的幻想法师施展魔法，它看起来会很合适。

✅优化

您掌控一切。这个资产经过优化。它非常快速。您甚至可以让它更快。

忘记使用天空盒编辑器吧。您所需的一切都在这里。高质量、优化、游戏就绪。

已经购买Altos的游戏开发者们都爱它✨


"Altos 是最完美且美丽的天空、云彩和昼夜循环系统！它在我的项目中表现得非常出色，并且设置起来非常简单，可以获得美丽的云彩，与行业标杆如微软飞行模拟器相媲美。" - eggymelon

"美丽的云彩和天空盒，实现起来极其简单，还有一个昼夜循环，简直就像是锦上添花。每个人都需要这个！" - Fortypoundbaby

"云彩和天空看起来很棒，效果也很好，开发者在 Discord 上提供了惊人且快速的支持！" - Furgl

兼容性

编辑器版本

✅ 2021.3 LTS

✅ 2022.3 LTS

渲染管线

✅ 通用

❌ 内置

❌ HDRP

渲染路径

✅ 延迟渲染

✅ 前向渲染

API

✅ DirectX

✅ OpenGL

✅ Vulkan

✅ Metal

平台

✅ 主机

✅ PC

❌ WebGL

❌ 移动设备

❌ VR

我们推荐将 Altos 与以下内容搭配使用...

- Buto - URP 的体积雾和体积光照

- URP 的自动曝光

- URP 的终极光照着色器

entry.title: AllSky - 220+ Sky / Skybox Set
entry.content:
A full palette of 220+ skyboxes.Including Day, Night, Anime, Above the Clouds, Cartoon, Fantasy, Hazy, Epic, Space, Mammatus, Sunless and Moonless categories.

A full palette of 220+ skies for Unity!


- Various styles: Including Day, Night, Ghibli inspired Anime, Above the clouds,Cartoon, Fantasy, Hazy, Epic, Space, Mammatus, Sunless and Moonless!


- For lighting artists, environment artists and indie developers looking for a wide suite of skies to light their environments.


- Lighting from day to night: Twilight, sunset, multiple times of day, multiple times of night, skyglow.


- Many weather and cloud types: Clear, overcast, summery, stormy, autumnal, hazy, epic, foggy, cumulus.


- Online Documentation


- AllSky is a very large asset. It could take time to import the complete set of skyboxes!

Consult the AllSky catalogue in the documentation to find skies you want to import.


- For Built-In and URP Render Pipelines.

entry.title: AllSky - 220+ Sky / Skybox Set
entry.content:
适于Unity的220多个天空！- 各种风格：白天、夜晚、动漫、云上、卡通、幻想、朦胧、壮丽、太空、 乳状云、无阳光和无月光！

适于Unity的220多个天空！


- 各种风格：白天、夜晚、动漫、云上、卡通、幻想、朦胧、壮丽、太空、 乳状云、无阳光和无月光！


- 适用于寻找各种各样的天空以照亮其环境的照明艺术家、环境艺术家和独立开发人员。


- 从白天到夜晚的照明：黄昏、日落、白天的多个时间段、夜晚的多个时间段、天空辉光。


- 多种天气和云的类型：晴朗、多云、夏季、暴风雨、秋季、朦胧、壮丽、多雾、积云。


- 在线文件（英文）

entry.title: Better Fog: Height Fog, Light Scattering & More

link.href: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Better Fog Height Fog, Light Scattering & More/ignore-index-en/

entry.id: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Better Fog Height Fog, Light Scattering & More/ignore-index-en/

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Better Fog Height Fog, Light Scattering & More/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
Add depth and feel to your game. Achieve greater realism or craft a truly unique look. Improve or completely transform your game's appearance without concerns over transparents, water, or skyboxes.

Better Fog is a post-processing effect offering a wide variety of features to craft numerous looks and styles, from realistic to stylized. This effect is not a volumetric solution, ensuring optimal performance. It also includes additional features such as a plane or sphere analytical world fog, a custom fog particle shader, and more. Crafted using Shader Graph (URP) and the Amplify Shader Editor (Built-in), Better Fog supports transparent objects without the need to modify their shaders.


Join Discord for updates, to report issues, or just to say hello!

Please check the documentation before purchasing.


Features:

  • Screen Space Light Scattering (SSMS): Use it to create a more realistic feel for the fog.
  • Gradient Fog Colors: Create your own custom look or use one of the many gradients included with the asset.
  • Skybox Fog Integration: Ensure consistent visuals with any skybox.
  • Distance-Based Fog: Default fog with the option to use radial distance.
  • Height Fog: Atmospheric height fog.
  • Volume Blending: Use post-processing volumes to blend between various presets.
  • Transparents & Particle Support: The fog works well with particles and transparent objects.
  • World Fog: Customize and add fog using planes and spheres with custom shaders.
  • Custom Fog with Particles: Includes procedural fog particle FX.
  • Fog Energy Loss: Imitate the loss of photon energy due to fog scattering.
  • Simple Integration: Easily add the effect to your project.
  • Versatile Customization: Adjust each feature as needed and use keywords for better performance.

Compatibility:

  • Supports URP and Built-in versions 2021.3 and above.
  • Unity 6 support! (see limitations below)
  • Built-in requires Shader Graph for the demo scenes to work.

Limitations:

  • Only supports directional light light scattering.
  • Non-volumetric.
  • No MSAA support.
  • Requires devices capable of depth rendering.
  • No support for orthographic camera, VR, webGL, VFX graph particles blending.

entry.title: Better Fog: Height Fog, Light Scattering & More
entry.content:
为您的游戏增添深度和感觉。 实现更真实的效果或打造真正独特的外观。 改进或完全改变游戏的外观，无需担心透明、水或天空盒。

Better Fog 是一种后处理效果，提供多种功能，可打造从逼真到风格化的多种外观和风格。 这种效果不是体积解决方案，可确保最佳性能。 它还包括其他功能，例如平面或球体分析世界雾、自定义雾粒子着色器等。 Better Fog 使用 Shader Graph (URP) 和 Amplify Shader Editor（内置）制作，支持透明对象，无需修改其着色器。


加入我们新的 Discord 获取更新、报告问题或只是打个招呼！

购买前请检查文档。


Discord

Documentation


特征：

屏幕空间光散射 (SSMS)：使用它可以为雾创建更真实的感觉。

渐变雾色：创建您自己的自定义外观或使用资源中包含的众多渐变之一。

天空盒雾集成：确保与任何天空盒保持一致的视觉效果。

基于距离的雾：默认雾，可以选择使用径向距离。

高度雾：大气高度雾。

体积混合：使用后处理体积在各种预设之间进行混合。

透明物体和粒子支持：雾对于粒子和透明物体效果很好。

世界雾：使用带有自定义着色器的平面和球体自定义并添加雾。

带粒子的自定义雾：包括程序雾粒子 FX。

雾能量损失：模拟由于雾散射而导致的光子能量损失。

简单集成：轻松将效果添加到您的项目中。

多功能定制：根据需要调整每个功能并使用关键字以获得更好的性能。


兼容性：

支持URP和内置版本2021.3及以上。


限制：

仅支持定向光。

非体积。

不支持 MSAA。

需要能够进行深度渲染的设备。

不支持正交相机、VR、webGL、VFX 图形粒子混合。

entry.title: Toon Fantasy Nature
entry.content:
SICS Games presents:

A stylized collection of assets to add beautiful environments to your game.

Any questions or suggestions?

Feel free to get in touch with us on our Discord


◙ Featuring ◙


• 200 prefabs ranging from small plants and rocks to large oaks and pine trees.

• 8 Demo Scenes showcasing all assets from the package with multiple lighting presets (post-processing profiles included).


◙ Asset list ◙


• Vegetation Assets •


(x137) Plants, Flowers & Trees

Vegetation Assets include:

(x36) Trees, such as Aspen Trees, Pine trees, Birch Trees, Oak Trees, etc.

(x18) Fallen & Broken Trees

(x38) Bushes, Ferns, Flowers, etc.

(x20) Lillies, Lotus Flowers, and other water friendly plants.

(x18) Mushrooms


• Rocks •


(x20) Rocks, ranging from small pebbles to large boulders


• Exterior Props •


(x25) Props, including Wooden Pavilion & Swing Set, Camp Fire (Fire Particle System included), Fence & Bridge Kit, etc.


• Background Assets & Decals •


(x18) Background Trees, Debris & Fallen Leaves

(x3) Hand-painted Skyboxes: Day, Night & Sunset.


• Particle Systems •


(x8) Particle Systems, including Sun Shafts, Fireflies, Falling Leaves, etc.



This package fits in perfectly with other assets from the collection:

Toon Series


Support and Community:

Discord • Forum • Twitter • Mail

entry.title: Toon Fantasy Nature
entry.content:
SICS Games 呈现：

一套风格化的资源集合，为您的游戏增添美丽的环境。

有任何问题或建议吗？

欢迎通过我们的 Discord 与我们联系

◙ 特色 ◙

• 200 个预制件，从小植物和岩石到大型橡树和松树。

• 8 演示场景 展示了该包中的所有资源，并配有多种光照预设（包括后期处理配置文件）。

◙ 资源列表 ◙

• 植被资源 •

(x137) 植物、花卉和树木

植被资源包括：

(x36) 树木，如 白杨树、松树、桦树、橡树 等。

(x18) 倒下的和破损的树木

(x38) 灌木、蕨类植物、花卉 等。

(x20) 百合、莲花 和其他水生植物。

(x18) 蘑菇

• 岩石 •

(x20) 岩石，从小卵石到大石块

• 外部道具 •

(x25) 道具，包括 木制凉亭和秋千、篝火（包括火粒子系统）、围栏和桥梁工具包 等。

• 背景资源和贴花 •

(x18) 背景树木、碎片和 落叶

(x3) 手绘天空盒：白天、夜晚和日落。

• 粒子系统 •


(x8) 粒子系统，包括 阳光光束、萤火虫、落叶 等等。

此包与该系列的其他资产完美契合：

卡通系列

支持与社区：

Discord • 论坛 • 推特 • 邮件
